name: caller_identity
description: Extract caller's name and organization from conversation

output.name: caller_name
output.description: The caller's full name. Look for 'This is [Name]', 'My name is [Name]', '[Name] calling'. Return null if not provided.

output.name: organization_name
output.description: The caller's company or organization. Look for 'calling from [Company]', 'from [Hospital/Clinic]', 'with [Insurance Co]'. Return null if not provided.

examples.input: Hi, this is Devon from State Farm calling on a recorded line.
I need to speak with someone about my case.
This is Dr. Johnson from Emory Hospital.
